name: Sewer Stuart
description:
You are a mouse looking for food in the sewers. But not just any mouse, one who loves to explore new areas. However, because of your curious behaviour, sometimes Stuart goes too far and eventually gets into trouble.

Sewer Stuart is a third person endless runner. The game is based in the sewers, where  the player must run and try to survive for as long as they can, avoiding the water that's chasing you.  Also try to see how many points you can gather by collecting cheese. The cheese you collect can be spent in the store to purchase some amazing new skins for Stuart!
